name: Grandma's Balls
description:
Grandma's Balls is a prototype of a multiplayer party game for 2-4 players where you play as grandma's hallucinations on the wall.

Think; LSD, Air Hockey, Dodge ball and fun for the whole family.

Developed by the duo Limerep and KabisCube

Controls:
The prototype is controller only, apart from the menu that is navigated using the mouse.
Input: The game supports Xbox 360 controllers.
Left stick: Movement
Right stick: Aim
RB: Quick shot (slow but no cast time)
RT: Charged shot (faster ball speed but a heavy knock)
Speeds:
There are four speeds to choose from, Grandpa - the slowest -, Normal, Grandma and for those who have lightning reflexes, Ancient Grandma.
